content: this mini raglan sweater ornament is worked top-down in the round using raglan increases for shaping the final product is a small decorative sweater that is ~10 cm wide and ~13 cm long perfect as a festive ornament or a playful gift this pattern is available in one size only the finished body measures ~10 cm wide and ~13 cm long from hem to collar sleeve length is ~10 cm from the underarm
